title: padam nambinEn
sahitya:
padam nambinEn shankarA kapAlI krpAharA undan


anupallavi

  nidam ulaga sukham shatam ena ninaindu
neri tavari naDandEn mannittaruL malarp-


caraNam    kaNDadaiyE kaNDu aluppu salippinri uNDadaiyE uNDu veTkam shiridhuminri
kaNDadE kAtSi koNDadE kOlamAi kAlam kazhittadaiyum mannittaruL malarp-
